description: This Dart source file defines the AppTheme class, which provides a custom Material3 ThemeData for a Flutter application. It sets up color constants and a method to generate a themed app with specific styling for app bars, cards, FABs, input decorations, and page transitions.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing custom color constants and a method to generate a tailored ThemeData for a Flutter app, supporting Material3 design and specific UI styling.

methods.name: oceanProfessional
methods.description: A static method returning a ThemeData object configured with a custom ColorScheme, typography, and component themes for a consistent app-wide style.
